summary: A Courier arrives with a letter from Nizrum Carshag, Northern Shores Bandit leader. He challenges you to face him at his hideout in the heart of deadly Nordic ruin, Vybors Rest.
descriptionHtml:
A large Nordic dungeon teeming with Draugr and other nasties, Vybor\'s Rest is a challenge at any level.  Fight your way through and vanquish Nizrum Carshag the Orc bandit leader who thinks he can kill the Dragonborn.

This mod has taken me weeks to build as its my first time using creation kit.  Any comments are welcome, but be kind please.  I have playtested this to oblivion and back and certainly I cannot find any bugs or glitches in this build.

To start the quest a Courier will deliver you a letter. Simply go to a major town exit a building and the courier will approach you.

Good luck, have fun and give me your feedback!

Cheerz! Milk Drinkers!
author: Nirrum
